entities.name: department of mysteries
entities.description: The Department of Mysteries is a location in the story where Harry walks through. It is described as having silvery lights on the wall.

entities.name: pensieve
entities.description: A Pensieve is an object that contains Snape's thoughts and memories. It is sitting on Snape's desk.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is a person who has thoughts and memories stored in the Pensieve. He does not want Harry to see them.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is a person who is curious about Snape's thoughts and memories stored in the Pensieve.

entities.name: montague
entities.description: Montague is a person who is being released from the toilet by Snape.

relationships.description: The Pensieve contains Snape's thoughts and memories.
Harry walked through the Department of Mysteries.
Snape is releasing Montague from the toilet.
Harry is curious about Snape's thoughts and memories stored in the Pensieve.
